item.description:
We will be hitting up hartford tonight. We will check out a few place but possible club event going on so make sure you follow dress code: collared shirt, designer T-shirt, nice pants, and shoes. No boots, baggy clothes etc. If you don't get in it aint on us.


Lets meet up at Margeritas, go over a few things, and head out after a bit. 8:30-9:00
item.how_to_find_us: I will try to get a table in the bar area. I'll have the miami fedora.
item.name: Hartford Sarge
